duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage and oversee all aspects of the investment lifecycle, underwriting, and closing new real estate investments.
Liaison across various functions within the credit platform including investments, capital markets, asset management, portfolio analytics, and financial reporting.
Review property due diligence, interact with third-party service providers, and complete market analysis.
Assist in the credit analysis, transaction closing, and asset management processes for both new and ongoing investments.
Manage the day-to-day management of the existing real estate portfolio, including reporting processes across various stakeholders.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree from a top undergraduate institution (Master's preferred)
